title: Protecting the Power Grid - Best of Coast to Coast AM - 1/30/20
itunes:title: Protecting the Power Grid - Best of Coast to Coast AM - 1/30/20
description:
George Noory and author Don Trumbull discuss his efforts to strengthen America's power grid from the dangers of a massive solar flare or nuclear bomb terror attack, as well as how individuals can protect their families if the government can't provide assistance.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
